subject: Re: [junit] Question about running tests
msgSnippet: Hi, Its possible. The TestResult class has certain methods which allows you to access the statistics. For more details please have a look at the JUnit API
messageBody:
Hi,
Its possible. The TestResult class has certain
methods which allows you to access the statistics. For
more details please have a look at the JUnit API
documentation .

-Vani
--- Joseph Toussaint <jdtoussa@...> wrote:
> I have a object which extends TestCase and works if
> I run the
> junit.textui.TestRunner - but I'd like to run it
> from inside a java class
> and get back the statistics - such as failure,
> success, and runtime. Is
> there any way I can do this or am I fighting a
> loosing battle?
>
> thanks
>
> joe
>
>
